title: 纯净生存玩家落泪
author: mohui666
txt_content:
你告诉我这个工程量是生存能建的？
光是造书架都得累死，幸好我是创造




Screenshot_20200309-072837.jpg (283.77 KB, 下载次数: 0)

（一共有四层）

replies.author: kaiyv
replies.txt_content: 生存的确能建
难道你要建

replies.author: 零x
replies.txt_content: 生存的话应该要很久

replies.author: RainIFunS
replies.txt_content: 熟悉，哪个图书馆来着0-0

replies.author: hyzgzz
replies.txt_content: 能建啊，不难啊

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content:
bhyzgzz 发表于 2020-3-9 07:59
能建啊，不难啊
书架太麻烦了

replies.author: creeperkight
replies.txt_content: 只要你够肝生存也能建

replies.author: hyzgzz
replies.txt_content:
mohui666 发表于 2020-3-9 08:08
书架太麻烦了
awa 建议疯狂养牛

replies.author: 离心丶
replies.txt_content: 生存的肝帝可以

replies.author: pt66
replies.txt_content: 为了信仰。能建下去，，，，

replies.author: JMBishark
replies.txt_content: 肝帝绝对行

replies.author: jinvgy
replies.txt_content:
其他的可能还好
但这书架量是要我死

replies.author: 二零醚
replies.txt_content: tis

replies.author: 依然冰奈斯
replies.txt_content: 书架六个绿宝石一个哪里贵啦

replies.author: 飞羽_fly
replies.txt_content: 书架的确很废肝，为了做一个满级附魔台我可是遍地找牛
甘蔗 养牛马就皮革难搞

replies.author: dbjdbj
replies.txt_content: 我觉得可以

replies.author: wzh123123
replies.txt_content: 可曾听闻tis，刷牛机，自动甘蔗地

replies.author: 苦于数学
replies.txt_content: 这，我想起来了一个枪战的地图

replies.author: Skyer
replies.txt_content: 大型图书馆

replies.author: 红箭
replies.txt_content: 看上去累人

replies.author: 凌月2487
replies.txt_content: 生存能不能搞就看有没有mod了有mod省事的多

replies.author: 七海八千代
replies.txt_content:
建是能建...
不过要好久
（不过我只会火柴盒）

replies.author: EGEE2468
replies.txt_content: 书架还好种甘蔗，养牛附魔掠夺，找村民换

replies.author: 平常的三倍
replies.txt_content: 只要够肝，在生存里玩出创造的感觉也不是问题（确信）

replies.author: 后悔の少年
replies.txt_content: 种树和红石收甘蔗和养牛

replies.author: MashKJo
replies.txt_content: 等价交换值得你拥有

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content:

手机建的你说个锤子

replies.author: 空中亮的秀
replies.txt_content: 加油加油加油

replies.txt_content: 这装的哪是书 是肝啊

replies.txt_content: 多杀牛搞皮革，弄出这么多书架不是梦

找奸商去买啊

replies.txt_content: 只有够肝就行
